thread.title: Justin Bieber is far from apologetic about his new single, Sorry
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber is far from apologetic about his new single, Sorry

title: Justin Bieber is far from apologetic about his new single, Sorry
text:
Justin Bieber is far from apologetic about his new single, Sorry Justin Bieber is far from apologetic about his new single, Sorry 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Justin Bieber is really, really sorry about something – but it certainly isn’t releasing his latest single, Sorry, which has left him jumping for joy. 
The singer shared a tweet of himself bouncing on a mini trampoline in celebration of the latest single. 
— Justin Bieber (@justinbieber) October 23, 2015 
The song comes complete with a “dance video” on YouTube, which is exactly what it says on the tin. 
Justin, 21, also shared an eclectic mixture of photographs on Instagram – with “Sorry” emblazoned on top. Shots included a squirrel, Michael Jackson, and personal trainer Patrick Nilsson. 
Fans loved the new single…
